name: Watch Ping Pong
description:
Classic PONG like arcade game for the Apple Watch, AppleTV and the iOS platform:

iOS/Apple TV Version:
- Squash / Tennis / Soccer
- 1 Player / 2 Player
- 3 Difficulty modes
- Highscore

Apple Watch Version:
- Use the Digital Crown to control the racket
- Two difficulty modes
- Highscore
